markdownRemark.excerpt: Yes — as long as that value is authenticated by your API. It’s worth nothing your user can have a fake value and see the page, but your api will not…
markdownRemark.html: Yes — as long as that value is authenticated by your API. It’s worth nothing your user can have a fake value and see the page, but your api will not authenticate it obviously.

frontmatter.title: Yes — as long as that value is authenticated by your API.
What do you mean by completely secure SPA?
